name: nativescript-ezaudio
description: NativeScript plugin for the iOS audio visualization framework built upon Core Audio useful for anyone doing real-time, low-latency audio processing and visualizations.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate ios
scripts.livesync.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns livesync ios --emulator --watch
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-ezaudio; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
